name: Tower of Creation (Zalán Kórósi)
description:
"It's so ugly!"
- My sister

"Yet another try hard quirky game..."
- A co-worker of mine

"I don't like the battle system"
- My best friend

So ... what is this?

It's a story rich Portal like puzzle platformer, with Persona like enemy encounters. Your goal as the player is to reach the tower through various obstacles, puzzles and enemy encounters. Befriend strange creatures, hack enemies, create an invincible party, dominate the factories beneath and reach the tower!

Premise

Humanity has never gained the fruit of the knowledge, thus the first sin has never happened. However life in the Paradise is not as flawless as it seems. A young person decides to approach the Tower of Creation to escape this reality.

Other Platforms

The game is still in development for other platforms. My next target is the Steam Deck.

Controller Support

Yes, the controller support is fully integrated.
